AWS-GR_CLOUDTRAIL_CHANGE_PROHIBITED.description: Ensures that CloudTrail configuration cannot be changed

AWS-GR_CLOUDTRAIL_CLOUDWATCH_LOGS_ENABLE.description: Ensures that CloudTrail logs are sent to CloudWatch Logs

AWS-GR_CLOUDTRAIL_ENABLED.description: Ensures that CloudTrail is enabled in all accounts

AWS-GR_CLOUDWATCH_EVENTS_CHANGE_PROHIBIT.description: Ensures that CloudWatch Events configuration cannot be changed

AWS-GR_CONFIG_ENABLED.description: Ensures that AWS Config is enabled in all accounts
